items.name: Combat Pistol
items.description: A reliable sidearm for close quarters combat. Standard issue for security personnel.

items.name: Tactical Rifle
items.description: Military-grade assault rifle with excellent accuracy and stopping power.

items.name: 9mm Rounds
items.description: Standard pistol ammunition. Reliable and effective for small arms.

items.name: 5.56mm Rounds
items.description: High-velocity rifle ammunition designed for maximum penetration.

items.name: Medkit
items.description: Advanced medical supplies that can treat serious injuries and restore health.

items.name: Bandage
items.description: Basic medical supplies for treating minor wounds and stopping bleeding.

items.name: Scrap Metal
items.description: Recycled metal components useful for crafting and repairs.

items.name: Electronic Parts
items.description: High-tech components salvaged from various devices. Essential for advanced crafting.

items.name: Energy Drink
items.description: A high-caffeine beverage that temporarily increases stamina and alertness.

items.name: MRE
items.description: Military Meal Ready-to-Eat. Provides substantial nutrition and energy.

items.name: Security Keycard
items.description: A high-level access card that opens restricted areas.

items.name: Data Chip
items.description: A encrypted data storage device containing critical mission information.

items.name: Old Photo
items.description: A faded photograph of unknown significance. Might be important to someone.
